contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 17, 2018 D Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship
Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship 0 Entertainments Contest
welsh-open-brass-band-entertainment-championship
Grand Pavilion, Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales, UK Sykes is the music adjudicator, and Hayward will award the entertainment prize.
To the Highest Placed Section One Band not in the Prizes: £300 with EIFION W. ROGERS TROPHY – Ebbw Valley To the Band with the Most Entertaining Stage Presentation: £300 with PORTHCAWL TOWN COUNCIL TROPHY - Tylorstown To the Best Soloist on the Day: SECRETARY’S ROSEBOWL – Robin Hackett Trombone Ebbw Valley To the Best Cornet Player on the Day: ARTHUR BATTEN MEMORIAL TROPHY – Sarah Jane Wallbridge Wantage To the Best Soprano Player on the Day: 4BARSREST TROPHY & £50 – Ian Roberts City of Cardiff To the Best Horn Section on the Day: JEAN GARDINER TROPHY - Llwydcoed To the Best Percussion Section on the Day: YORWETH & MEGAN GOWING MEMORIAL TROPHY – Filton Concert To the Youngest Instrumentalist on the Day: ROSEMARY DEERE SHIELD – Tom Hoof Jackfield aged 12 SPECIAL AWARD An Invitation to Compete at the 2018 Spring Festival Senior Trophy – Wantage
Jan. 11, 2018, 2:27 p.m. Feb. 19, 2018, 6:38 p.m.
1 Filton Concert Brass Band Tom Davoren
2 Llwydcoed Band Chris Turner
3 Wantage Silver Band Paul Holland
4 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter
5 Jackfield Elcock Reisen Band Simon Platford
6 Goodwick Brass Matthew Jenkins
